code:
def solve(n, d, l, r)
    return $h[r] if $h.has_key?(r)
    max = 0
    n.times do |i|
        if r & d[i] == d[i]
            ret = l[i] + solve(n, d, l, r - d[i]) 
            max = ret if ret > max
        end
    end
    return $h[r] = max
end
loop do
    $h = Hash.new
    n = gets.to_i
    break if n == 0
    d = Array.new(n, 0)
    l = Array.new(n)
    n.times do |p|
        m, l[p] = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
        m.times do
            t = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
            for i in ((t[0] - 6)...(t[1] - 6))
                d[p] += 1 << i
            end
        end
    end
    p solve(n, d, l, (1 << 16) - 1)
end

from collections import defaultdict
while 1:
    n = int(raw_input())
    if n == 0: break
    L = [0]*n
    T = [0]*n
    for man in xrange(n):
        m,l = map(int,raw_input().split())
        L[man] = l
        t = 0
        for date in xrange(m):
            s,e = map(int,raw_input().split())
            t |= 2**(e-6)-2**(s-6)
        T[man] = t

    dp = defaultdict(int)
    for l,t in zip(L,T):
        for bit in dp.keys():
            if bit&t == 0:
                dp[bit|t] = max(dp[bit|t], dp[bit]+l)
        dp[t] = max(dp[t], l)
        
    print max(dp.values())

while 1:
    n = int(raw_input())
    if n == 0: break
    L = [0]*n
    D = [0]*n
    for man in xrange(n):
        m,l = map(int,raw_input().split())
        L[man] = l
        t = 0
        for date in xrange(m):
            s,e = map(int,raw_input().split())
            t ^= ((1 << (e-6))-1) ^ ((1 << (s-6))-1)
        D[man] = t
    dp = [[0]*(1 << 17) for i in xrange(n)]
    dp[0][D[0]] = L[0]
    for i in xrange(1,n):
        for bit in xrange(1 << 17):
            if dp[i-1][bit] and bit&D[i] == 0:
                dp[i][bit|D[i]] = max(dp[i][bit|D[i]], dp[i-1][bit]+L[i])
        dp[i][D[i]] = max(dp[i][D[i]], L[i])
    print max(max(dp[i]) for i in xrange(n))

from collections import defaultdict
while 1:
    n = int(raw_input())
    if n == 0: break
    L = [0]*n
    D = [0]*n
    for man in xrange(n):
        m,l = map(int,raw_input().split())
        L[man] = l
        t = 0
        for date in xrange(m):
            s,e = map(int,raw_input().split())
            for s in xrange(s-6,e-6):
                t |= 1 << s
        D[man] = t

    dp = [defaultdict(int) for i in xrange(n)]
    dp[0][D[0]] = L[0]
    for i in xrange(1,n):
        for bit in dp[i-1].keys():
            if bit&D[i] == 0:
                dp[i][bit|D[i]] = max(dp[i][bit|D[i]], dp[i-1][bit]+L[i])
            dp[i][bit] = max(dp[i][bit],dp[i-1][bit])
        dp[i][D[i]] = max(dp[i][D[i]], L[i])
        
    ans = max(max(dp[i].values()) for i in xrange(n))
    print ans

from collections import defaultdict
while 1:
    n = int(raw_input())
    if n == 0: break
    L = [0]*n
    T = [0]*n
    for man in xrange(n):
        m,l = map(int,raw_input().split())
        L[man] = l
        t = 0
        for date in xrange(m):
            s,e = map(int,raw_input().split())
            t |= 2**(e-6)-2**(s-6)
        T[man] = t

    dp = defaultdict(int)
    dp[T[0]] = L[0]
    for i in xrange(1,n):
        for bit in dp.keys():
            if bit&T[i] == 0:
                dp[bit|T[i]] = max(dp[bit|T[i]], dp[bit]+L[i])
        dp[T[i]] = max(dp[T[i]], L[i])
        
    print max(dp.values())

from collections import defaultdict
while 1:
    n = int(raw_input())
    if n == 0: break
    L = [0]*n
    D = [0]*n
    for man in xrange(n):
        m,l = map(int,raw_input().split())
        L[man] = l
        t = 0
        for date in xrange(m):
            s,e = map(int,raw_input().split())
            t ^= ((1 << (e-6))-1) ^ ((1 << (s-6))-1)
        D[man] = t
    dp = [defaultdict(int) for i in xrange(n)]
    dp[0][D[0]] = L[0]
    for i in xrange(1,n):
        for bit in dp[i-1].keys():
            if bit&D[i] == 0:
                dp[i][bit|D[i]] = max(dp[i][bit|D[i]], dp[i-1][bit]+L[i])
        dp[i][D[i]] = max(dp[i][D[i]], L[i])
    ans = 0
    for i in xrange(n):
        ans = max(v for k,v in dp[i].iteritems())
    print ans
